page.title: 10ELIZABETH ANN KITCHENS.
page.content: Manufacturers of kitchen units,formed in 1947 as {JOHNSON BRITISH WOODCRAFTS later adopting the name{ELIZABETH ANN. The closure of the factory was announced in March 1985,causing redundancy for over 400 employees.The manufacturing element of the company being concentrated on their Surrey factory.At the height of manufacturing output the factory produced 500 complete units per week which were then transported to the Denbigh factory for assembly. Most of the machinery has been removed to Surrey and it is expected that the factory will close completely by March 1986. { }
